deshapalakayanta, jathyanthara kotipathi jawaram karuwanta thama panchaskandhaya santharpanaya kara ganimata menma wyaparika winodathmaka awashyathawan sandaha hotal, thabarum, karmanthashala, gowibim, lagum hal, nana thataka, abhayabhumi ha purawidyathmaka menma aagamika sthana dakwa pimme yamataya adhiwegi marga yoda ganne.
"ethakota leda wela marunoth?"
ee puthu aa langa dan nathi wunath, nitharama aa gana soya balanawa…
oyita awurudu hathara pahakata passe, eeth me binda watunu prema palahilawwakata, nihal waha bila diwinasa gaththa.mama ethakota wena sayit ekaka wada kale.
obata udawwak oona welawata ee minissu ee minissu udaw karanne anna ethakota.

budurajanan wahanse prathama dharma deshanawa wu dhammachakkappawaththana suthra deshanawa pawathwima me athara pradhanathwaya gani.thawada wessanthara aathma bhawayen pasu thusitha dewlowa ipadunu apa mahabosathanan wahanse mahamaya dewiya kusa pilisinda ganima, wisinawa wana wiyedi sathara peranimithi daka gihigeya kalakiri abhinishkramanaya kirima, buduradun pramukha paswaga mahanunge prathama wassupagamanaya siduwima, rahula kumaru ipadima ,gandabba ruk mulhidi thirthakayan ge manaya mardanaya karanu was buduradun yamamaha pelahara pama, mathru diwyarajaya pramukha pirisata wijam pitakayen hewath abhidharmayen dharma deshana sidukirima, sambuddha parinirwanayen thun masakata pasu thruthiya mahashrawaka mahakashyapa maharahathan wahansege pradhanathwayen prathama dharma sangayanawa pawathwima sandaha rajagahanuwara was elambaa mulika katayuthu aarambha kirima yana siduwim shasana ithihasayehila asala pohoya wadagathwimata balapana karunu athara pramukhathwaya ganiyi.lanka shasana ithihasaya pilibanda wimasimedi mihindu maha rahathan wahanse pramukha bhikshun wahansela wisin sammatha karana lada mahawihara simawa thula prathama khanda simawa sammatha kirima, lakdiwa aritta kumaru pramukha sinhalayan 56 deneku pawidi upasampadawa labima, dewanampiyathissa raju wisin mihinthalaye kantaka chethiya wata kara wu ata sata len pujawa, maharahathan wahansela hata denamak palamuwarata lakdiwa was elambaima.dutugamunu maharaju ruwanwali maha saya thanimata mangala shila prathishtapanaya sidu kirima, ema mahasayehi dhathu nidhanothsawaya sidu kirimada, dalada wahanse lakdiwata wadamakarawimen pasu warshika dalada maha perahare aarambhaya siduwima yana karunu asala pohoya ha sambandhawa itha wadagath weyi.baranasa isipathana nam wu migadayehi di paswaga mahanun arabhaya buduradun dhammachakkappawaththana suthra deshanawa pawathwima asala pohoda wu mema sama siduwimak atharama wadath pramukhathwaya ganiyi.
